context_bundle.summary: PAD email actions: Send Email (SMTP), Retrieve Emails (IMAP/POP3 with filters), Process Emails (move/delete/mark). Supports attachments, HTML body, SSL

onboarding.quick_start: Send email SMTP:'smtp.server.com' port:587 SSL:True from:'x' to:'y' subject:'z' body:'msg'. Retrieve emails filter by subject -> Process (mark read/move)
common_patterns: Send email server:'smtp.gmail.com' port:587 SSL:True from:'sender@' to:'recipient@' subject:'Subject' body:'Message' HTML:True
Retrieve emails server:'imap.gmail.com' port:993 SSL:True retrieve:Unread folder:'INBOX' -> %Emails%
For each %Email% in %Emails% -> Process attachments save to:'folder'
Send email attachments:%FileList% (list of file paths)
known_errors: Gmail requires App Password, not account password
Large attachments may timeout - check server limits
Some servers require specific authentication methods
